slides.title: Chat-Commerce Assistant in yuu App Answers Questions and Builds Personalised Bundles
slides.description: LLM chatbot inside the yuu app lets shoppers type or speak queries like “Where’s oat-milk?” and instantly returns shelf location, bundle offers, and promo explanations—boosting conversion and basket size. Walmart’s ‘Text to Shop’ is a comparable example.
slides.image_prompt: Comic-style split scene: left panel shows a shopper holding a phone with the yuu app, speech bubble: “Where’s oat-milk?”; right panel shows the screen with a smiling AI avatar, aisle map, and highlighted breakfast bundle. Use bright arrows linking query to answer to emphasise instant AI help and upsell.

slides.title: Receipt-to-Recipe Cross-Sell Engine Suggests Meals and Add-On Items After a Scan
slides.description: Customer scans a Giant receipt; an LLM proposes recipes and recommends Guardian vitamins or Cold Storage extras, nudging cross-banner sales—similar to Carrefour’s Cookit scan-to-cook feature.
slides.image_prompt: Vibrant comic frame: shopper points phone camera at a crumpled receipt; the screen pops up a colourful recipe card with extra ingredient icons and add-to-cart buttons. A lightbulb icon above the shopper shows new meal ideas.

slides.title: Real-Time Bilingual Shelf-Talker Generator Prints Compliant Labels Instantly
slides.description: LLM converts supplier spreadsheets into English-Mandarin shelf labels in seconds, ensuring legal wording and faster planogram updates—echoing Tesco’s automated ticketing pilots.
slides.image_prompt: Comic panel: tablet connected to label printer spits out bilingual shelf tags; employee swaps plain tags for fresh ones while an AI hologram gives a thumbs-up. Motion lines show rapid printing.

slides.title: Voice Copilot on SOPs for Store Staff via Handheld Devices
slides.description: Employees voice-query procedures—e.g. thawing seafood—and receive instant, policy-linked answers on handhelds, cutting training time and enforcing compliance. IKEA’s Hej Copilot is a precedent.
slides.image_prompt: Comic close-up: employee with headset and handheld asks, “How to thaw crab?”; AI avatar speech bubble lists steps next to a seafood counter, each step tick-marked for compliance.

slides.title: Natural-Language What-If Supply-Chain Planner Handles Demand Shocks in Seconds
slides.description: Planners ask scenarios like “Stock needs if haze index 150?” and get demand, waste, and cost projections from Dingdong forecasts plus weather data—mirroring Kroger’s AI scenario tools.
slides.image_prompt: Comic frame: analyst at desk types question into a large screen; floating charts morph to show demand curves and veggie icons. Cloud-shaped thought bubble depicts a hazy skyline, linking external shock to data.

slides.title: Carbon-Aware Delivery Routing Optimiser Cuts CO₂ and Logistics Costs Simultaneously
slides.description: AI models pick delivery routes that balance cost, cold-chain integrity, and carbon footprint, surfacing greener options—akin to UPS ORION’s emissions logic.
slides.image_prompt: Dynamic comic map: two routes—one long & red (high CO₂), one short & green (low CO₂). AI drone icon directs trucks onto the green path; emission numbers shrink beside the green route.

slides.title: Generative Marketing Copy Factory Produces Flyers, Banners, and Messages from One Brief
slides.description: GenAI turns a single creative brief into flyer text, app banners, and WhatsApp blasts, routed through Straive’s LLM Foundry for brand-safety—cutting campaign cycles by 30-50 %. Coca-Cola’s generative ads prove the model.
slides.image_prompt: Comic montage: central brief document feeds three conveyor belts, ending in a colourful poster, a phone banner, and a chat bubble. AI robot stamps “Approved” on outputs, showing speed and consistency.

slides.title: Two-Week AI Literacy Sprint Gamifies Prompt Craft and ROI Measurement for Employees
slides.description: Bootcamp uses Straive’s evaluation sandbox; staff build prompts, test models, and compete on ROI metrics—mirroring Walmart’s large-scale GenAI upskilling.
slides.image_prompt: Comic classroom: diverse staff at laptops with floating prompt cards; coach AI avatar points to a big timer labelled “14-Day Sprint”. Progress bar fills as lightbulbs pop over participants.

slides.title: In-Store AI Copilot on Tablet Guides Shelf-Stackers to Optimise Merchandising in Real Time
slides.description: Tablet-based AI assistant suggests perfect shelf placement, flags gaps, and answers product questions, improving planogram compliance. Lindex’s store copilot offers a precedent.
slides.image_prompt: Bright comic panel: shelf-stacker holds a tablet showing a holographic AI overlay with arrows pointing to optimal shelf spots. Products shine where placed correctly; the worker smiles confidently.

slides.title: Computer Vision Shelf Monitoring System Alerts Replenishment and Planogram Compliance
slides.description: Edge cameras and ML detect empty spots and misplacements, pushing alerts to staff devices—adopted by Kroger and Ahold in the US.
slides.image_prompt: Comic view from ceiling camera: software heat-map highlights empty spaces. Nearby tablet pops a red alert icon to a surprised employee, who dashes toward the shelf with a box of goods.

slides.title: AI Wellness Kiosk with AR Provides Instant Health Checks and Product Advice in Guardian Stores
slides.description: Kiosk scans face or palm, predicts vitals with clinical accuracy, and an LLM suggests supplements or skincare—expanding Mannings HK’s AI Wellness Scan to Singapore.
slides.image_prompt: Comic pharmacy scene: customer peers into a sleek kiosk; AR overlay shows heartbeat icon and vitamin suggestions. Friendly AI avatar floats beside, offering advice.

slides.title: AI Demand Forecasting and Replenishment Engine Prevents Fresh-Food Stockouts
slides.description: ML combines sales, weather, and holiday data to predict daily demand for perishables, reducing waste and lost sales—extending the Dingdong pilot.
slides.image_prompt: Comic warehouse chart: line graph of forecasted vs. actual demand overlaid on crates of produce; AI robot adjusts order quantities with a slider, preventing empty crates.

slides.title: QR-Code Product Traceability Platform Shows Farm-to-Shelf Journey and Safety Data
slides.description: Each item gets a unique code linking origin, cold-chain, and inspection data; customers scan to verify freshness—similar to Carrefour China’s blockchain pork traceability.
slides.image_prompt: Comic: shopper scans QR code on mango; phone displays animated farm-to-store timeline with green checkmarks. Behind, farmer and delivery truck icons wave.

slides.title: Dynamic Pricing Algorithm Adjusts Shelf Prices in Real Time by Demand and Competition
slides.description: LLM-backed engine ingests sales velocity, competitor scraping, and inventory to set smart discounts, lifting margin and sell-through; Amazon and REWE test similar.
slides.image_prompt: Comic shelf edge with digital price labels changing from 3.50 → 3.30; AI cloud icon crunches graphs overhead. Shopper smiles at the timely discount.

slides.title: Personalised Promotion Generator Crafts Coupons and Bundles for Loyalty Members Automatically
slides.description: LLM analyses yuu purchase history to push hyper-personal vouchers via app and email, raising redemption rates; Target’s Roundel uses comparable AI.
slides.image_prompt: Comic mobile screen: golden ticket coupon pops up with user’s name and tailored bundle. Confetti bursts while AI avatar high-fives the shopper.

slides.title: Real-Time Product Recommendation Engine Suggests Complementary Items Online and In-App
slides.description: Embedding-based recommender surfaces “Customers also buy…” suggestions personalised to each session, increasing average order value; Amazon pioneered this.
slides.image_prompt: Comic e-commerce page: product image at centre; sidebar pops recommended items with glowing outline. Arrows show upward basket total.

slides.title: LLM Customer Service Chatbot Handles Inquiries 24 × 7 Across Web, App, and WhatsApp
slides.description: Chatbot resolves order tracking, returns, and product questions, automating >60 % of tickets—mirroring Carrefour and Decathlon deployments.
slides.image_prompt: Comic messaging chat: customer asks “Where’s my order?”; AI bot replies with tracking map and ETA. Night-time window behind indicates 24/7 service.

slides.title: AI Email and Chat Triage Routes Customer Messages to Correct Teams Automatically
slides.description: Model classifies intent, extracts order IDs, and forwards to billing, delivery, or store—cutting response time by 40 %. Similar to Zendesk AI add-ons.
slides.image_prompt: Comic inbox: emails funnel through an AI filter into colour-coded buckets (billing, delivery, feedback). Stopwatch icon shows saved time.

slides.title: AI CV Screening Assistant Shortlists Candidates and Answers Applicant Queries Pre-Interview
slides.description: LLM ranks resumes on skills fit, flags diversity balance, and runs applicant Q&A chatbot—Parallels Unilever’s HireVue AI.
slides.image_prompt: Comic HR desk: stack of CVs flows through AI scanner, only top ones get a green tick. Chat bubble on monitor answers candidate question about store hours.

slides.title: Adaptive Training Content Generator Creates Personalised Learning Modules for Store Staff
slides.description: LLM builds micro-lessons and quizzes that adjust to each learner’s progress, boosting retention; Walmart Academies tests similar GenAI modules.
slides.image_prompt: Comic tablet lesson: quiz adapts difficulty meter from green to red based on answers. Employee smiles as star badges appear for progress.

slides.title: Internal Knowledge Base Chatbot Delivers Instant Answers on Policies, Products, and Legal Rules
slides.description: RAG-powered assistant indexes manuals and SOPs, letting employees ask free-text questions; akin to Carrefour’s legal bot.
slides.image_prompt: Comic break room: staff asks kiosk “Return policy for cosmetics?” AI bot displays concise answer with link icons to PDF source.

slides.title: Automated Narrative Reporting Bot Summarises Financial and Operational Data for Management
slides.description: GenAI converts dashboards into plain-language weekly briefs, highlighting anomalies—PwC trials show 80 % faster report cycles.
slides.image_prompt: Comic office: CFO reads a neat one-pager titled “This Week in Numbers” while complex charts collapse behind into speech bubbles.

slides.title: Regulatory Intelligence Monitor Alerts Teams to New Rules and Their Operational Impact
slides.description: AI scans government sites, flags food safety or labour law changes, and summarises action items—mirrors HSBC’s reg-tech bots.
slides.image_prompt: Comic radar screen with scrolling legal documents; alert siren pops over specific clause. Manager receives concise action list on tablet.

slides.title: Intelligent Document Processing Extracts Data from Invoices and Purchase Orders with High Accuracy
slides.description: OCR + LLM captures line-items, taxes, and terms from PDFs, pushing data to ERP; Carrefour and Ahold use similar IDP stacks.
slides.image_prompt: Comic inbox of PDFs pulled into AI pipeline; fields auto-populate a spreadsheet, while paper stack shrinks magically.

slides.title: Carbon and Energy Analytics Dashboard Tracks Store Emissions and Efficiency in Real Time
slides.description: AI ingests IoT and utility data to visualise energy use, predict overages, and recommend savings—Starbucks deploys comparable ESG dashboards.
slides.image_prompt: Comic control room: big screen shows animated bar chart of kWh dropping as lights dim. Green earth icon smiles in the corner.

slides.title: Waste Reduction Optimiser Predicts Spoilage and Suggests Markdowns Before Food Expires
slides.description: ML analyses sell-by dates and velocity to time markdowns, cutting waste and boosting margin—Morrisons UK uses similar ‘Too Good to Go’ logic.
slides.image_prompt: Comic produce shelf: items glow red as AI clock counts down; employee applies yellow discount sticker just in time, while trash bin stays empty.

slides.title: Sustainable Sourcing Insights Engine Scores Suppliers on ESG Metrics for Better Buying Decisions
slides.description: AI merges certification, news sentiment, and emissions data to rank suppliers, guiding ethical procurement—comparable to Carrefour’s Eco-Score project.
slides.image_prompt: Comic dashboard: suppliers appear on green-to-red leaderboard with leaf icons. Buyer uses magnifying glass icon to pick top-ranked vendor.

demos.description: Summarize customer sentiment
Generate synthetic audience for market research

Summarize customer sentiment

Query APIs through natural language
AI Assitant for creating documentation from code
Investment research copilot
Sales copilot for investment management sales teams

From Concept to Poster: Single-prompt poster generation
Automatically generate and test hypotheses on data

Identify customer willingness to pay from call transcripts
Generate clinical data quality and regulatory reports from data
Automated analysis of patient calls
Address discrepancies based on TILA (Truth in Lending Act) disclosures
Project Management Tools: Analyze emails and monitor project communications
AI Assistant for managing and responding to RFP
Customer Inquiry Response Generator uses LLM to generate positive and empathetic responses to customer inquiries.
Leverage LLMs to summarize customer interactions with concise, actionable post-call documentation.
Compare and select the best AI models based on features like input/output tokens, cost, and supported data types.
Ask questions verbally to a video knowledge base. Dynamically create a video response to a question. Train using video
Allow publishers to provide guided assistance to students by answering specific queries actionably from knowledge bases.
Assess check fraud risk by applying rule-based analyses on scanned checks and highlighting high-risk transactions.
Automates transaction and account reconciliation processes
Tracks significant risk events affecting portfolios
Use multi-agent workflows to accurately identify if a patient feedback is an adverse event
Explore the real-time usage of LLM Foundry animating each request users in Straive make
Explore the real-time adoption of LLM Foundry within each team in Straive visually
Convert text into speech by selecting a model, voice type, and audio format to generate high-quality audio files.
Allow LLMs to talk to each other, creating new body of knowledge
Answer questions from relevant clinical trials from ClinicalTrials.gov using LLMs
Analyze candidate resumes against a job description using LLMs to find the best matches
Identify the main drivers of IT incidents among trading applications. Analyze and recommend actions using LLMs
Generate personalized insights from LinkedIn profiles to help sales & marketing teams prepare for meetings
Summarize and create an abstract for a PDF chapter from a book
Automatically generate reports from data using templates and summarize with Gen AI
Evaluate the quality of prompts and models. Use LLMs to improve their quality systematically
What personality traits to different LLMs exhibit? Explore the psychology of LLMs using the Big 5 test
Search and answer questions from videos of hip surgery using the visuals, despite lack of audio
Extract structured information from images across industries using LLMs
Extract deal news (investor, company, deal size, PE/VC, etc.) from major deal news sites
A visual interface for knowledge graphs. Upload your CSV to see a knowledge graph
A WhatsApp bot that can answer author questions about manuscript status (or anything else)
Status checks are ~25% of publishing support requests. This automates email replies to status checks.
Finding the status of your IT service request via a Google Chat message (or Teams, WhatsApp, etc.)
Talk to your dataset - directly in the browser. It converts text to SQL and explains the answer.
Analyze documents for errors and redline them for edits (like track changes in Word)
Implement a comprehensive email management system to streamline communication, track client requests, and identify risk emails in the absence of a project manager
Generate Alt Text from images for accessibility
Real-time assistants for customer support that summarizes, audits and suggests responses
Search videos with plain text. Videos were segmented at keyframes and described along with the objects.
Automatically evaluate subjective answers based on a grading guide with feedback
Identify the emotion expressed by customers during a call and respond appropriately
Explore which teams interact the most and least and plan facilities accordingly
Generate closure letters for customer service complaints
Code-first agent framework for seamlessly planning and executing data analytics tasks
Generate synthetic data for use in anonymization in clinical trials
Evaluate a job description based on clarity of role, attractiveness, diversity, etc.
Classify images and cluster them by similarity at low cost using image embeddings
Transcribe and summarize customer service calls to find unresolved issues and audit quality
Explore what terms are present (or absent) in any contract, reducing risks
Bring the power of LLMs to spreadsheets. Drag & drop AI-powered formulas
Which LLMs are the best value for money? Explore the best and worst by cost and quality
Personalize video and podcast transcripts to financial advisors using their portfolio and interests
Ask questions about Learningmate's HR, IT or admin policies. Get answers with references
Categorize documents into topics cheaply using embeddings
Discover the biases in LLMs by asking them to guess a random number. 42 is very popular!
Explore driver profile photos and their similarity using image embeddings
Answer questions based on each and every one of the 5,000 biomolecule paper abstracts on Arxiv. [Also on DocExplore](https://gramener.com/docexplore/biomolecule-papers/)
Search over 4,000 consumer complaints about credit cards in Q1 2024 to understand the most common issues and resolutions. [Also on DocExplore](https://gramener.com/docexplore/credit-card-complaints/)
Explore the sustainability themes covered by oil & gas companies like BP, CNPC, ExxonMobil, Shell, etc.
Understand how LLMs work and learn how to detect hallucinations automatically
Identify whether a driver's photo meets the defined criteria or not
Chat with the 10K filings of Amazon, Apple, Cisco, Dell, Google, IBM, Intel, Microsoft, NVIDIA, and Tesla.
DocSearch: Use Gen AI to improve quality of search and summarization across 7,000 published articles.
Answer 15 questions. Benchmarks your Gen AI adoption with peers. Discover areas to focus.
Allow developers to securely access any LLM via a single proxy and audit usage
Uncover paper-mill articles. Improve research quality. Reduce risk from fraudulent authors.
Explore the open CRM cases on SalesForce and identify the main topics of discussion.
Technology and Information Rulebook of the Dubai Virtual Assets and Related Activities Regulations 2023 (VARA)
An Excel formula, LLM(), that talks to ChatGPT and you can drag across cells
Talk to ChatGPT. Proves our ability to recognize speech in real-time and reply with speech.
Explores Rivian's first Impact Report covering initiatives and accomplishments in 2022.
A conversational BI interface with HR data (FTEs, Hiring, Termination).
An analysis of the messages received at a waste management company's website.
Feedback from Straive employee survey on what's positive and what can be improved.
Suggestions from customers to publisher on what corrective and preventive action is required
Enable LLM adoption securely and at low cast using an LLM Proxy to all AI providers
Explore the topics discussed in the G20 2023 summit and what BMGF goals they addressed.
Analyze Amazon reviews of Quaker Oats to see what customers like / dislike
Explore the abstracts submitted to the GPAI Summit 2023 Research Symposium, and which AI topics they addressed the most
